column1: Little Goat Diner////We got there about 6:30 to put our name in. Conveniently
column2: they take your name and number and text you when they are ready. They are great bars all around to get drinks while waiting! They said it would be a 60-75 minute wait which was no problem since we planned to hang out at Haymarket. Little did we know
column3: our table was ready much sooner
column4: but there was a text messaging issue so we finally walked over after 75 minutes. They felt so bad we had the next available table with complimentary gluten free nachos!
